questions.question: Which of the following practices would help you minimize the environmental impact of your ML workloads on AWS?
options: Use on-demand instances for all training jobs
Train large models without considering reuse
Utilize Spot Instances and energy-efficient instance types
Use the largest possible models for every task
correct_answers: Utilize Spot Instances and energy-efficient instance types
questions.Practice test: AWS Certified Machine Learning Engineer Associate: Hands On!
